sentences.en: And branding should continue in the offline world too, she said.
sentences.cn: 她说“品牌也应该在网络之外的世界继续发展.”

sentences.en: Branding brain storming: How China brands enter World Brands Club?
sentences.cn: 品牌头脑风暴: 中国品牌怎样进入世界品牌俱乐部?

sentences.en: Branding will separate your blog from the millions out there.
sentences.cn: 品牌会让你千千万万的博客中脱颖而出.

sentences.en: Is this simple the product of clever branding and marketing?
sentences.cn: 这仅是出自巧妙的品牌和行销策略之下的产品 吗 ?

sentences.en: Labbrand is a Shanghai based naming and branding agency.
sentences.cn: 郎标是位于上海的品牌命名事务所.

sentences.en: Local companies find the sites and build the theme parks, while we will look after the branding.
sentences.cn: 本地公司选择场地及兴建主题公园，我们则负责品牌维护。

sentences.en: Museums are generally ahead of dealers in the branding game.
sentences.cn: 在命名竞赛中,博物馆通常跑在艺术商前面.

sentences.en: People are probably know better on a product than its branding.
sentences.cn: 对于产品而言,人们可能知道的比较多.对于品牌就一知半解.

sentences.en: Personal branding is essential to professional success today.
sentences.cn: 个人商标对于当今个人成功是很必要的.

sentences.en: Please enter the path to the folder containing dynamic branding files.
sentences.cn: 请输入包含动态商标文件的文件夹路径.

sentences.en: Some people believe that web design starts and stops with branding.
sentences.cn: 有人认为网站设计的目的就是提高网站的知名度.

sentences.en: That makes branding a continent a lot harder.
sentences.cn: 这使得给一块大陆做宣传更加困难.

sentences.en: The branding campaign has gone quite well, so far.
sentences.cn: 截至目前,品牌化运动已经相当不错.

sentences.en: The success of any branding campaign depends on what the market thinks.
sentences.cn: 任何品牌战略的成功都取决于市场意见.

sentences.en: Today, branding occurs at the individual level.
sentences.cn: 今天, 品牌开始延伸至个人层面.

sentences.en: We will provide branding guidelines and look and feel.
sentences.cn: 我们将提供指导方针和品牌的外观和感觉.

words.tran_cn: 名牌商标的；打有烙印的；有斑纹的（等于brindled）
铭刻（brand的过去式和过去分词）
铭刻于，铭记；打烙印于；印…商标于

trans.tran_en: a practice that involves a company giving a group of their products the same brand name, helping this name to become well-known

trans.tran_cn: 污辱( brand的现在分词 )，铭刻于，加商标于，打烙印于
